name: Klefki
description: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's non-damaging moves have their priority increased by one stage.
abilities.description: Gives priority to a status move.

abilities.name: Magician
abilities.effect: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.
abilities.description: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.
